name: agent-wiki
description: Maintains an auto-updating wiki for agent context about how repository components work

commands.name: wiki:init
commands.description: Initialize a new wiki by exploring the codebase

commands.name: wiki
commands.description: Update the wiki to reflect recent changes

commands.name: wiki:reorganize
commands.description: Evaluate and reorganize wiki structure if needed

commands.name: wiki:serve
commands.description: Start a local web server to browse the wiki

agents.name: wiki-explorer
agents.description: Explores a partition of the codebase to gather documentation context

agents.name: wiki-coordinator
agents.description: Coordinates wiki updates and writes final pages
